item.description:
﻿Diane will lead you on a ride through the little towns of the south shore to the beautiful coastal town of Westport. This ride certainly covers all types of terrain which I'm sure you will treasure like those of us who have traveled it before.

Our final destination will be brunch at the Bayside Restaurant, hopefully outside, overlooking the Elizabeth Islands at Buzzards Bay. 

The ride there will be about 1 1/2 hours (~45 miles)

The ride back can be as short or long as we want it, many options. We can talk about it while enjoying the company, views and food. There's even a Harley dealer in there somewhere for those of you who might want to do a little shopping. ;)

 

FIRST MEETING LOCATION:  Derby Shops In Hingham

MEETING TIME:   915 am

                         Kickstands up at 945 am

 

SECOND MEETING LOCATION: ﻿Friendly's (Middleboro Rotary)

MEETING TIME: 10:30, Kickstands up at 10:45

group.name: New England Thunder / South Shore, MA

item.name: Cape Crawl
